text: Willowdale Airfield was located in Willowdale, Toronto, Ontario near Finch Avenue and Senlac. Like many of the small aerodromes in Toronto, it disappeared before World War II. The airfield was built on farmland once owned by local settler Joseph Shepard, who owned over 200 acres of land.http://www.biographi.ca/en/bio/shepard_joseph_7E.html In 1948, the former airfield became part of what is now York Cemetery. ==See also== * List of abandoned airports in Canada * List of airports in the Greater Toronto Area ==References== Category:Defunct airports in Ontario
title: Willowdale Airfield
